meanings.definition: To write before the final version.
meanings.sent1: I always prewrite my essays before writing the final draft.
meanings.sent2: She likes to prewrite her speeches to ensure they are well-organized.
meanings.sent3: The students decided to prewrite their group project together for fun.
meanings.sent4: His mind began to prewrite a story that would captivate readers.
meanings.sent5: Prewriting helps to plan out ideas before putting them into a final piece.

meanings.definition: The act of writing before the final version.
meanings.sent1: Prewriting is an essential step in the writing process.
meanings.sent2: Her prewrite was full of detailed notes and outlines.
meanings.sent3: The prewrite of the novel was accidentally left in the library.
meanings.sent4: The prewrite of the play set the stage for a successful production.
meanings.sent5: The teacher emphasized the importance of a thorough prewrite before starting the essay.
